alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Prowers County Including Lamar; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 27 at 4:44PM MST until February 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226, 227, 234, 235, 236, AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226, 227, 234, 235, 236 and 237. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Prowers County Including Lamar; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
